Definition / Etiology: Chronic hyperglycemia due to insulin deficiency (Type1) or insulin resistance + relative deficiency (Type2).
Clinical Goals: Achieve glycemic control, prevent complications, maintain healthy weight and lipid profile.
MNT - Macronutrients: Carbs 45/50% (low-GI), Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg, Fat 20/30% (MUFA/PUFA).
MNT - Micronutrients: Chromium, Magnesium, Zinc, Vitamin D, B-complex, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Adequate hydration; avoid sugary drinks; monitor electrolytes if on diuretics.
MNT - Special Notes: Emphasize fiber, low GI, timed meals, carbohydrate counting where needed.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha/Pitta imbalance; bitter, astringent foods helpful; spices: cinnamon, fenugreek.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Walk 30/45 min daily, resistance training twice weekly, pranayama (Anulom Vilom).
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I allow the sweetness of life to flow through me. I balance my body with calm action.

Definition / Etiology: Excess adipose tissue due to chronic positive energy balance influenced by diet, activity, genetics.
Clinical Goals: Achieve gradual weight loss, preserve lean mass, improve metabolic health.
MNT - Macronutrients: Calorie deficit ~500 kcal/day; Protein 1/1.2 g/kg; Carbs 45/50% complex; Fat 25/30%.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, B12, Magnesium, Iron (if deficient), Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydrate well; avoid sugary beverages; monitor electrolytes during weight loss.
MNT - Special Notes: Focus on portion control, high protein for satiety, fibre-rich meals, behavioral strategies.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha predominance; bitter, pungent tastes reduce Kapha; use trikatu in small amounts.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: 45/60 min daily activity (mix cardio + strength), sleep 7/8 hrs, mindful eating.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I lovingly release what no longer serves me. I am light and capable.

Definition / Etiology: Hormonal disorder with hyperandrogenism, ovarian dysfunction and often insulin resistance.
Clinical Goals: Improve insulin sensitivity, balance hormones, support ovulation and weight management.
MNT - Macronutrients: Carbs 40/45% low-GI, Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg, Fat 25/30% with omega-3s.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, Inositol, Chromium, Magnesium, Zinc, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Adequate fluids; reduce sugary drinks; avoid excessive caffeine.
MNT - Special Notes: Prioritize low-GI foods, regular meals, and anti-inflammatory nutrients.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha/Vata imbalance; include flaxseed, fenugreek, spearmint tea.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: 45 min activity, strength training, yoga (Baddha Konasana), stress reduction.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My body is in perfect rhythm. I nurture my feminine energy with patience.

Definition / Etiology: Underactive or overactive thyroid affecting metabolism, energy and growth.
Clinical Goals: Normalize thyroid function, address symptoms (weight, fatigue), ensure nutrient support.
MNT - Macronutrients: Hypo: Calorie control, Protein 1/1.2 g/kg; Hyper: higher calories as needed, Protein 1.2 g/kg.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iodine (adequate), Selenium, Zinc, Iron, Vitamin D, B12.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration as per symptoms; monitor electrolytes with meds.
MNT - Special Notes: Avoid goitrogens raw for hypothyroid; time meds on empty stomach; monitor interactions.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Kapha in hypothyroid; Pitta in hyperthyroid. Use warming herbs for hypo, cooling for hyper.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Thyroid meds 30/60 min before food, gentle yoga (Sarvangasana with guidance), stress management.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am in alignment with my inner rhythm. My body finds balance and expression.

Definition / Etiology: Cluster of conditions: central obesity, hypertension, dyslipidemia, insulin resistance increasing CVD risk.
Clinical Goals: Reverse components: reduce waist/weight, improve lipids, control BP and glucose.
MNT - Macronutrients: Calorie control, Protein 1/1.2 g/kg, low-GI carbs, healthy fats (MUFA/PUFA).
MNT - Micronutrients: Omega-3, Magnesium, Vitamin D, B-complex.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Reduce alcohol; hydrate; limit sugary fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Lifestyle = cornerstone: diet, activity, sleep, stress reduction.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha/Pitta features; anti-inflammatory diet and spices like turmeric help.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Regular aerobic + resistance training, sleep, reduce stress, avoid tobacco.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I restore balance to my metabolism. My body works with me.

Definition / Etiology: Abnormal lipid levels and atherosclerosis increasing heart disease risk.
Clinical Goals: Lower LDL/TG, raise HDL, reduce inflammation and CVD risk.
MNT - Macronutrients: Carbs 45/50%, Protein 0.8/1.2 g/kg, Fat 20/30% (limit sat & trans).
MNT - Micronutrients: Omega-3, Niacin (B3), Magnesium, Vitamin D, CoQ10.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration healthy; limit alcohol; avoid trans-fat containing foods.
MNT - Special Notes: Include soluble fiber, plant sterols, nuts; avoid processed snacks.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Kapha imbalance; garlic, guggul (supervision), flaxseed.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Cardio + resistance; stress reduction; no smoking; heart opening yoga.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My heart is strong and steady. I nourish it with wise choices.

Definition / Etiology: Persistently elevated blood pressure increasing risk of stroke, heart disease and kidney disease.
Clinical Goals: Lower BP, reduce sodium, improve vascular health and weight.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients; DASH-style: fruits, veg, low-fat dairy, whole grains.
MNT - Micronutrients: Potassium, Magnesium, Calcium, Vitamin D, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Sodium <1500/2000 mg/day, adequate hydration; monitor diuretics.
MNT - Special Notes: Reduce salt, increase potassium-rich foods, DASH dietary pattern.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta + Vata influences; cooling foods like coriander, amla helpful.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Regular aerobic exercise, deep breathing, yoga (Savasana, Shitali), reduce stress.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: Calmness flows through every beat of my heart. I release tension.

Definition / Etiology: Low BP causing dizziness, weakness; due to dehydration, anemia, endocrine causes or medications.
Clinical Goals: Restore intravascular volume, optimize electrolytes, address underlying causes.
MNT - Macronutrients: Ensure adequate carbs and balanced meals; moderate protein 0.8/1.0 g/kg.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron (if anemic), B12, Folate, Electrolytes (sodium as needed).
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Increase fluids, electrolyte-containing drinks, small frequent meals.
MNT - Special Notes: Avoid sudden posture changes; add modest salt if clinically appropriate.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance (often) with low ojas; warming, nourishing foods (ghee, warm soups).
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Gentle inversions under guidance, pranayama for grounding (Bhramari), slow posture changes.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am steady, grounded, and supported. My circulation flows with ease.

Definition / Etiology: Low hemoglobin due to iron, B12 or folate deficiency or chronic disease.
Clinical Goals: Restore hemoglobin and iron stores, correct deficiencies, improve energy.
MNT - Macronutrients: Adequate calories, Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg to support erythropoiesis.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, Vitamin B12, Folate, Vitamin C to aid absorption, Copper.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration adequate; avoid tea/coffee with iron-rich meals.
MNT - Special Notes: Enhance iron absorption (vitamin C), use cast-iron cookware, check for malabsorption.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta tendencies; use amla, sesame, pippali to support digestion and blood.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Gentle strengthening, regular meals, abdominal massage to improve digestion.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My blood renews and nourishes every cell. I am full of life.

Definition / Etiology: Functional or structural GI conditions causing pain, altered bowel habits and reflux.
Clinical Goals: Relieve symptoms, restore gut motility and microbiome, correct deficiencies.
MNT - Macronutrients: Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg; Carbs 45/55% adjusted for FODMAP sensitivity; Fat 20/30%.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, B12 (if malabsorption), Zinc, Electrolytes; Prebiotic fiber.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration important; avoid carbonated drinks for GERD.
MNT - Special Notes: Personalize FODMAP, increase soluble fiber for constipation, probiotic foods as tolerated.
Ayurvedic View: Vata (constipation), Pitta (GERD), Kapha (sluggish digestion); use ginger, fennel.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Mindful eating, abdominal massage, pranayama, regular routine.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My digestion processes life with ease and calm.

Definition / Etiology: Immune-mediated enteropathy triggered by gluten in genetically susceptible individuals.
Clinical Goals: Complete gluten elimination, heal intestinal mucosa, correct nutrient deficiencies.
MNT - Macronutrients: Gluten-free carbs (rice, millets, quinoa), Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg, Fat 25/30%.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, Folate, B12, Vitamin D, Calcium, Zinc.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration as needed; avoid lactose if secondary intolerance present.
MNT - Special Notes: Strict lifelong gluten-free diet, prevent cross-contamination, supplement deficiencies.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta tendencies; soothing foods like ghee, ginger, cumin.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Regular meals, avoid stress, gut-healing herbs, mindful eating.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My gut is calm and healed. I accept nourishing foods with ease.

Definition / Etiology: Mucosal erosion usually due to H. pylori infection or NSAID use causing epigastric pain.
Clinical Goals: Promote healing of gastric mucosa, reduce acid-related damage, ensure adequate nutrition.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients; avoid very spicy/fatty meals that irritate mucosa.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin A, C, Zinc, Vitamin B12 if needed.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Avoid irritants like alcohol; small frequent meals may help.
MNT - Special Notes: Avoid NSAIDs, incorporate mucoprotective foods (yogurt, ghrita where appropriate).
Ayurvedic View: Pitta imbalance likely; cooling, soothing foods like aloe, coriander.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Stress reduction, pranayama, avoid late-night eating, soothe digestive fire.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My inner lining heals gently and I am protected.

Disorder Name: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (Crohn's Disease & Ulcerative Colitis)
Definition / Etiology: Chronic inflammatory disorders of the GI tract causing malabsorption and systemic symptoms.
Clinical Goals: Control inflammation, maintain nutrition, prevent malnutrition and deficiencies.
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy as needed; Protein 1.2/1.5 g/kg in active disease, adjust carbs and fat per tolerance.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, B12, Folate, Vitamin D, Zinc, Electrolytes.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration crucial; replace losses in diarrhea with ORS solutions.
MNT - Special Notes: Tailor fiber and fat during flares, use easily digestible, nutrient-dense foods.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Pitta imbalance with inflammation; cooling herbs, ghee for nutrition.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Stress reduction, gentle yoga, medical coordination, avoid trigger foods.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My gut is protected and nourished. I reclaim peaceful digestion.

Definition / Etiology: Chronic liver scarring and impaired function from alcohol, hepatitis or NAFLD progression.
Clinical Goals: Prevent further damage, maintain nutrition, manage complications (ascites, encephalopathy).
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy 30/35 kcal/kg if malnourished; Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg (modify in encephalopathy).
MNT - Micronutrients: B-complex, Vitamin D, Vitamin K, Zinc, Selenium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Fluid & sodium management if ascites; monitor electrolytes.
MNT - Special Notes: Small frequent meals, avoid alcohol, treat malabsorption, consider MCTs if needed.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta + Kapha imbalance; use turmeric, coriander, amla cautiously.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Early sleep, gentle yoga, avoid toxins, liver-supporting herbs under guidance.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My liver regenerates with ease. I release what no longer serves me.

Definition / Etiology: Excess fat accumulation in liver cells linked to obesity and insulin resistance.
Clinical Goals: Reduce liver fat, improve insulin sensitivity, achieve gradual weight loss.
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy 20/25 kcal/kg for weight loss; Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg; Fat 20/25% (limit sat/trans).
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin E (where indicated), Vitamin D, Omega-3, Selenium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration, avoid sugary drinks and fructose.
MNT - Special Notes: Avoid fructose, emphasize antioxidants and fiber, regular exercise.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha + Pitta features; turmeric, green tea, garlic supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: 20-min post-meal walk, avoid late-night eating, moderate exercise.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I release heaviness and embrace renewal in my body.

Definition / Etiology: Inflammation of the liver due to viral infection or toxins like alcohol.
Clinical Goals: Support liver healing, maintain nutrition during recovery, prevent progression.
MNT - Macronutrients: Adequate calories and protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg; adjust per tolerance.
MNT - Micronutrients: B-complex, Vitamin K, Vitamin D, Zinc, Selenium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration, avoid alcohol and hepatotoxic substances.
MNT - Special Notes: Antioxidant-rich diet, small frequent meals during nausea.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta aggravation; cooling foods, amla, coriander, avoid heated spices.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Rest, avoid alcohol, light movement as tolerated, herbs with supervision.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I support my liver with gentle care and patience.

Definition / Etiology: Progressive loss of renal function leading to waste accumulation and electrolyte imbalance.
Clinical Goals: Slow progression, maintain nutrition, manage uremia, control electrolytes & BP.
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy 30/35 kcal/kg; Protein 0.6/0.8 g/kg (pre-dialysis) or 1.0/1.2 g/kg (on dialysis).
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D (activated), B-complex, Iron (as needed), Zinc.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Fluid restriction per output; monitor sodium, potassium, phosphorus.
MNT - Special Notes: Leach high-potassium vegs, limit phosphorus-rich foods, individualized protein plan.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Kapha features; coriander water, punarnava supportive herbs.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: BP control, avoid NSAIDs, gentle yoga, monitor fluid intake and weight.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am balanced and supported. My body receives the care it needs.

Definition / Etiology: Crystallization of minerals in the urinary tract due to dehydration, dietary factors or metabolic issues.
Clinical Goals: Prevent recurrence, reduce stone-forming factors, maintain hydration.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients; avoid excessive animal protein if uric acid stones.
MNT - Micronutrients: Depending on type: calcium, citrate adjustments; ensure vitamin D adequacy.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: 3/4 L fluids/day, citrus drinks to increase urinary citrate.
MNT - Special Notes: Limit oxalate or purine-rich foods based on stone type; moderate calcium intake.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Vata tendencies; coriander, gokshura supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Hydration, avoid high-oxalate diet if susceptible, moderate salt intake.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I release blockages and flow with ease and lightness.

Definition / Etiology: A kidney disorder causing heavy proteinuria, hypoalbuminemia, edema and hyperlipidemia.
Clinical Goals: Reduce protein loss, control edema, ensure adequate nutrition and manage lipids.
MNT - Macronutrients: Protein moderate 0.8/1.0 g/kg (adjust per physician), calories sufficient 30 kcal/kg.
MNT - Micronutrients: Albumin support nutrients: Zinc, Vitamin D, B-complex, Iron if anemic.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Sodium restriction to control edema; fluid management as needed.
MNT - Special Notes: Manage protein intake per renal team; address hyperlipidemia with healthy fats.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Kapha imbalance; use punarnava and diuretic-supportive herbs under guidance.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Monitor weight, limb elevation for edema, gentle activity, low-sodium diet.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My body restores balance and I am supported in healing.

Definition / Etiology: Reduced bone mass and structural deterioration increasing fracture risk.
Clinical Goals: Maintain bone density, prevent fractures, correct calcium & vitamin D deficiency.
MNT - Macronutrients: Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg; Calcium-rich foods; balanced carbs & fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Calcium, Vitamin D, Magnesium, Vitamin K2, Zinc.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration normal; avoid excess caffeine which may affect calcium.
MNT - Special Notes: Weight-bearing exercise, ensure adequate calcium + vitamin D and protein.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance; warming nourishing foods like sesame, dates, ghee.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Sunlight 20 min/day, resistance training, yoga for balance (Tadasana).
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My bones are strong, grounded, and full of light.

Definition / Etiology: Softening of bones due to Vitamin D deficiency leading to bone pain and weakness.
Clinical Goals: Restore vitamin D and calcium, relieve pain, improve mobility.
MNT - Macronutrients: Adequate calories and protein for repair.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, Calcium, Phosphate, Magnesium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration normal; sunlight exposure encouraged.
MNT - Special Notes: Supplement vitamin D under supervision, safe sun exposure, dietary calcium.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance with weakness; sesame, ghee, warm milk supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Sunlight, gentle strengthening exercises, avoid rapid weight-bearing progression.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: Sunlight nourishes my bones and I grow stronger each day.

Definition / Etiology: Joint inflammation; gout due to uric acid crystal deposition; OA due to wear and tear.
Clinical Goals: Reduce inflammation, control uric acid for gout, maintain mobility and weight.
MNT - Macronutrients: Protein ~1.0 g/kg; reduce purine-rich animal protein for gout; balanced carbs & fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Omega-3, Vitamin D, Calcium, Magnesium, Vitamin C.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration important to flush uric acid; limit alcohol.
MNT - Special Notes: Anti-inflammatory diet: turmeric, ginger, omega-3s; weight management for OA.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Kapha and Pitta for inflammatory patterns; use ashwagandha, guggul.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Gentle mobility exercises, oil massage, warm compresses, anti-inflammatory yoga.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I move with ease and grace. My joints are supported and calm.

Definition / Etiology: Nutritional support during and after cancer treatment to preserve lean mass and support immunity.
Clinical Goals: Prevent/treat malnutrition, support healing, manage treatment side-effects.
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy 30/35 kcal/kg; Protein 1.2/1.5 g/kg; adapt carbs/fat per tolerance.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, Zinc, Selenium, Vitamin C, B-complex, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration, small frequent nutrient-dense fluids; manage electrolytes.
MNT - Special Notes: Soft, nutrient-dense meals, focus on antioxidants and easy-to-eat foods during mucositis.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta often affected; nourishing herbs like ashwagandha, amla supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Gentle yoga, pranayama, rest, counseling and gradual activity return.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: Each cell in my body vibrates with vitality and healing energy.

Definition / Etiology: Post-viral recovery emphasizing restoration of strength, lung function and immune resilience.
Clinical Goals: Rebuild strength, restore immunity, reduce inflammation and fatigue.
MNT - Macronutrients: Energy 30/35 kcal/kg; Protein 1.2/1.5 g/kg; balanced carbs & fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin C, D, Zinc, Selenium, B-complex, Iron if needed.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration, warm fluids, electrolytes as needed.
MNT - Special Notes: Protein each meal, antioxidant-rich foods, gradual progressive physical rehab.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta tendencies; tulsi, mulethi, turmeric supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Pranayama for lung health (Anulom Vilom), gradual walking program, sunlight.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My breath flows freely. I am renewed and strong.

Definition / Etiology: Immune system attacks self-tissue; multi-system symptoms requiring individualized MNT.
Clinical Goals: Reduce inflammation, support immune regulation, correct deficiencies.
MNT - Macronutrients: Anti-inflammatory macronutrient balance; focus on adequate protein and healthy fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, Omega-3, Zinc, Selenium, B12 as indicated.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration, avoid triggers; monitor electrolytes with meds.
MNT - Special Notes: Elimination diets if indicated, anti-inflammatory foods, gut-support strategies.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Vata or Pitta/Kapha depending on disease; turmeric, guduchi under guidance.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Stress reduction, restorative yoga, gentle detoxification under supervision.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My immune system is wise and balanced. I honor my body's signals.

Definition / Etiology: Psychiatric conditions with disturbed eating behavior and body image issues.
Clinical Goals: Restore safe eating patterns, normalize weight and nutrients, address psychological factors.
MNT - Macronutrients: Gradual refeeding with energy 30/40 kcal/kg supervised; Protein 1.2/1.5 g/kg.
MNT - Micronutrients: B vitamins, Zinc, Vitamin D, Iron as indicated; electrolytes monitoring in bulimia.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration; monitor electrolytes especially with purging behaviors.
MNT - Special Notes: Multidisciplinary care: dietitian, therapist, medical monitoring for refeeding syndrome.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta imbalances; grounding, warm, nourishing foods, ghee, dates.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Mindful eating, therapy, family support, gentle movement, journaling.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I honor my body and nourish it with love. I am safe to receive.

Definition / Etiology: Eating in response to stress or emotions leading to weight fluctuation and metabolic impact.
Clinical Goals: Develop coping strategies, stabilize blood sugar, build mindful eating habits.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients to stabilize glucose; protein at each meal; fiber-rich carbs.
MNT - Micronutrients: Magnesium, B-complex, Vitamin D, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration to reduce cravings; avoid alcohol as coping mechanism.
MNT - Special Notes: Behavioral strategies, identify triggers, structured meals/snacks.
Ayurvedic View: Vata or Kapha patterns; calming herbs like tulsi and ashwagandha.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Stress management (meditation, breathwork), sleep hygiene, supportive community.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I meet my feelings with compassion and choose nourishing foods.

Definition / Etiology: Mood disorders influenced by inflammation, neurotransmitter imbalance and nutrition.
Clinical Goals: Support mood with diet, correct deficiencies, support sleep and energy.
MNT - Macronutrients: Omega-3 rich fats, adequate protein, whole grains, regular meals.
MNT - Micronutrients: B12, Folate, Vitamin D, Magnesium, Zinc, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration supports cognition; avoid excess caffeine before bed.
MNT - Special Notes: Regular meals, social support, therapy, exercise to boost neurotransmitters.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Kapha or Vata/Pitta depending on presentation; grounding foods helpful.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Movement, sunlight, social connection, mindfulness practices.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am held, I am healing, and my mind grows lighter each day.

Definition / Etiology: Nutritional needs during pregnancy to support fetal growth and maternal health.
Clinical Goals: Support maternal weight gain, fetal development, prevent deficiencies (iron, folate).
MNT - Macronutrients: Increased calories +300 kcal in 2nd/3rd trimester; Protein 1.1 g/kg; balanced carbs & fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Folate, Iron, Calcium, Vitamin D, B12, Iodine.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration increased; avoid excessive caffeine and alcohol.
MNT - Special Notes: Frequent meals, small snacks, avoid high-mercury fish, ensure prenatal supplementation.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha + Pitta considerations; nourishing warm foods like ghee, dates, millets.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Gentle prenatal yoga, pelvic floor care, sleep, emotional support.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I nourish my baby and myself with deep love and wise choices.

Definition / Etiology: Nutrition to support milk production and maternal recovery post-partum.
Clinical Goals: Ensure adequate calories, fluid and nutrients to support lactation and maternal health.
MNT - Macronutrients: Extra ~500 kcal/day initially; Protein 1.1/1.3 g/kg; balanced carbs & fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, Calcium, Vitamin D, B12, Omega-3.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration increased; drink fluids regularly when feeding.
MNT - Special Notes: Frequent nutrient-dense meals, galactagogues as needed, monitor maternal depletion.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha supportive foods, warm nourishing diet, fenugreek/ajwain under guidance.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Rest, support network, gentle postnatal yoga, feeding routines.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My body gives nourishing milk with ease. I am supported and strong.

Definition / Etiology: Nutrition for older adults focusing on preserving function, preventing sarcopenia and deficiencies.
Clinical Goals: Maintain muscle mass, bone health, cognitive function and prevent malnutrition.
MNT - Macronutrients: Adequate calories, Protein 1.0/1.2 g/kg, fiber for bowel health, healthy fats.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, B12, Calcium, Zinc, Protein-related nutrients.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Ensure hydration; monitor medications that affect fluids/electrolytes.
MNT - Special Notes: Texture modification if needed, nutrient-dense meals, fall prevention nutrition.
Ayurvedic View: Vata predominance with aging; nourishing, warm, easy-to-digest foods like ghee and kitchari.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Resistance training, balance exercises, social meals, cognitive stimulation.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I age with grace; my body is strong and nourished.

Definition / Etiology: Nutrition to optimize performance, recovery and body composition for athletes.
Clinical Goals: Fuel performance, optimize recovery, periodize nutrition with training.
MNT - Macronutrients: Carbs timing around training, Protein 1.4/2.0 g/kg for strength athletes, Fat 20/30%.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, Vitamin D, Calcium, B-complex, Electrolytes, Zinc.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Fluids & electrolyte replacement during/after training.
MNT - Special Notes: Periodized carbohydrate intake, protein distribution, supplements as needed.
Ayurvedic View: Depends on athlete; focus on grounding post-workout foods and herbs like ashwagandha.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Sport-specific training nutrition, recovery protocols, sleep and periodization.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I strengthen and recover with intention; my body performs with joy.

Definition / Etiology: Nutrition supporting growth and development in infants and children.
Clinical Goals: Support age-appropriate growth, prevent deficiencies, encourage healthy eating habits.
MNT - Macronutrients: Age-appropriate energy, Protein 1.0/1.5 g/kg depending on age, healthy fats for brain.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron (esp. infants), Vitamin D, Zinc, B12, Calcium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Ensure adequate fluids; monitor for dehydration with illness.
MNT - Special Notes: Breastfeeding support, weaning guidance, nutrient-dense snacks, avoid added sugar.
Ayurvedic View: Vata tendency in children; warm, nourishing foods, ghee, mild spices.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Routines, family meals, play and activity, sleep hygiene.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My child grows strong, curious, and joyful with nourishing food.

Definition / Etiology: Nutrition for teens supporting growth, hormonal changes and cognitive development.
Clinical Goals: Support puberty-related growth, bone accrual, and healthy body image.
MNT - Macronutrients: Increased calories for growth spurts; Protein 1.0/1.5 g/kg, calcium-rich foods.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron (girls), Calcium, Vitamin D, B-vitamins, Zinc.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration for activity; counsel on safe dieting behaviors.
MNT - Special Notes: Encourage balanced meals, snack planning, body positivity education.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta and Vata fluctuations; balancing cooling foods and grounding snacks.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Physical activity, education on body image, sleep regulation.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am growing with strength and confidence. My body is perfect for my journey.

Definition / Etiology: Low vitamin A leading to impaired vision and immunity.
Clinical Goals: Restore vitamin A stores, improve vision and mucosal health.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include carotene-rich foods; ensure dietary fat for absorption.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin A (beta-carotene sources)
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Use carrots, sweet potato, leafy greens, ghee to enhance absorption.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Vata imbalance; amla and ghee supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Sunlight, balanced meals, avoid excessive processed food.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I see life clearly and vibrantly.

Definition / Etiology: Low vitamin D affecting bone health, immunity and mood.
Clinical Goals: Restore vitamin D levels, improve bone and muscle function.
MNT - Macronutrients: Ensure adequate dietary calcium and protein.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin D, Calcium, Magnesium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids; encourage sunlight exposure.
MNT - Special Notes: Sunlight exposure, mushrooms, fortified foods, supplementation as needed.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance with weakness; sesame and ghee nourishing.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Sunlight 15/20 min daily, weight-bearing exercise.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I absorb the light and grow stronger each day.

Definition / Etiology: Rare; due to fat malabsorption causing oxidative stress.
Clinical Goals: Restore antioxidant status and prevent neurologic symptoms.
MNT - Macronutrients: Healthy fats to aid absorption.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin E from nuts, seeds, oils.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Include nuts, seeds, spinach; address underlying fat malabsorption.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta balance supportive with cooling oils and coconut.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Balanced diet, antioxidant-rich foods.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My body is protected by gentle strength and resilience.

Definition / Etiology: Impaired clotting and bone health due to low vitamin K.
Clinical Goals: Restore coagulation factors and support bone matrix.
MNT - Macronutrients: Leafy greens and dietary fats for absorption.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin K (leafy greens, fermented foods).
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Include spinach, kale, fermented foods, ghee for absorption.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Pitta balance.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Include greens regularly; monitor with anticoagulant therapy.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I heal and flow in harmony.

Definition / Etiology: Common in vegetarians; leads to anemia and neuropathy.
Clinical Goals: Restore B12 stores, improve neurological and hematologic function.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include fortified foods and adequate protein.
MNT - Micronutrients: Vitamin B12 (fortified foods, supplements), Folate supportive.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Consider supplementation for strict vegetarians; check intrinsic factor causes.
Ayurvedic View: Vata/Pitta vulnerabilities; warm nourishing diet.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Monitor levels, supplementation, neuro follow-up.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: Energy flows through every cell; I am vibrant.

Definition / Etiology: Leads to megaloblastic anemia and in pregnancy neural tube defects.
Clinical Goals: Restore folate stores, particularly important in pregnancy.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include folate-rich foods with balanced macronutrients.
MNT - Micronutrients: Folate (leafy greens, legumes), B12 supportive.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Ensure adequate intake in pregnancy; use cooked greens if absorp issues.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Vata supportive herbs like amla.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Prenatal planning, supplementation as needed.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I grow and create with ease and abundance.

Definition / Etiology: Common cause of anemia due to poor intake, loss, or malabsorption.
Clinical Goals: Restore iron stores and hemoglobin, correct symptoms.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include iron-rich meals with vitamin C at meals.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iron, Vitamin C, Folate, B12 where needed.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids; avoid tea/coffee with meals.
MNT - Special Notes: Use legumes, jaggery, sesame; enhance absorption with vitamin C.
Ayurvedic View: Vata + Pitta patterns; amla supportive.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Regular monitoring, dietary strategies and supplementation when needed.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My blood is rich with life and vitality.

Definition / Etiology: Affects immunity, wound healing, and growth.
Clinical Goals: Restore zinc status to support immunity and repair.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include zinc-rich plant foods and protein.
MNT - Micronutrients: Zinc (pumpkin seeds, legumes, nuts), B-complex supportive.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Address malabsorption; include seeds and legumes.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta/Kapha supportive foods and turmeric.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Balanced meals with protein and seeds regularly.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I renew and restore with natural strength.

Definition / Etiology: Leads to poor bone health, cramps, and in severe cases osteopenia/osteoporosis.
Clinical Goals: Restore calcium stores and support bone health.
MNT - Macronutrients: Include calcium-rich foods with vitamin D and protein.
MNT - Micronutrients: Calcium, Vitamin D, Magnesium, Vitamin K2.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Include ragi, sesame, dairy if tolerated, green leafy vegetables.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance; grounding foods like sesame and milk.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Weight-bearing exercise, sunlight and calcium-rich foods.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I am strong, stable and grounded.

Definition / Etiology: Leads to goiter, hypothyroidism and developmental issues in pregnancy.
Clinical Goals: Ensure adequate iodine to support thyroid and development.
MNT - Macronutrients: Use iodized salt and iodine-containing foods.
MNT - Micronutrients: Iodine (iodized salt, seaweed), Selenium supportive.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Normal fluids.
MNT - Special Notes: Promote iodized salt use; caution with excessive seaweed in pregnancy.
Ayurvedic View: Kapha/Vata considerations; gentle sea-sourced foods.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Monitor intake; ensure safe levels especially in pregnancy.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I express my truth clearly and confidently.

Definition / Etiology: Altered gut microbial composition affecting digestion, immunity and metabolism.
Clinical Goals: Restore healthy microbiome diversity, reduce dysbiosis symptoms, support gut barrier.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients with prebiotic fibers and adequate protein.
MNT - Micronutrients: Prebiotic fibers, Vitamin D, Zinc, Short-chain fatty acid support.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Hydration supports bowel function; avoid excessive alcohol.
MNT - Special Notes: Use fermented foods, prebiotics, probiotics, fiber diversity and minimize antibiotics when possible.
Ayurvedic View: Vata imbalance often with dysbiosis; use triphala ginger and fennel for digestion.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Stress reduction, sleep, gradual dietary fiber increase, fermented foods if tolerated.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: My inner garden blooms with balance and vitality.

Definition / Etiology: Structured nutritional approaches to support liver detox pathways and overall metabolic cleansing.
Clinical Goals: Support liver detox, antioxidant capacity, safe elimination and metabolic reset.
MNT - Macronutrients: Balanced macronutrients; emphasize complex carbs, adequate protein, healthy fats for phase II detox support.
MNT - Micronutrients: Glutathione precursors (cysteine), Selenium, B-complex, Vitamin C, Magnesium.
MNT - Fluids & Electrolytes: Adequate fluids; support renal clearance and bowel regularity.
MNT - Special Notes: Use antioxidant foods, cruciferous vegetables cooked, turmeric, adequate protein to support conjugation pathways.
Ayurvedic View: Pitta + Kapha considerations; gentle herbs like coriander, turmeric, amla, kutki under supervision.
Lifestyle & Yogic Guidance: Avoid prolonged fasting without supervision; gentle movement, dry brushing, sauna if appropriate.
Healing Affirmation: Affirmation: I cleanse gently and regenerate with loving care.
